attributes.action: The UK should revoke Royal Brunei Airline’s landing rights at Heathrow
attributes.background: The introduction of legislation to legalise the killing of gay men and women in Brunei has no place in the 21st century. It is a clear human rights violation - the government in Brunei needs to understand there will be consequences and such behaviour is not tolerated in the international community.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask the UK Parliament and Government to take action. The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for landing rights at Heathrow. 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254939
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251142
